name: getMedication
title: Operation for lookup medical and prescription information for a patient
description: This operation provides lookup in Kjernejournal and/or Reseptformidleren to collect and aggregate information on prescriptions, medication treatement, PLL (Pasientens LegemiddeListe), dispense information and Critical information
comment: This operation is complex, and requier that the Practitioner performing the operation presents a valid HelseID token with identity information, and that the authorisation is available in Helsepersonellregisteret

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: Must be present and contain Name, Address and (identifier OR (birthDate + gender))

parameter.name: Referansenummer
parameter.documentation: Refereansenummer shall always be present for patient without national ID. Referansenummer may be present for retreival of låst resept, doctors-name prescriptions or other

parameter.name: historyTimestamp
parameter.documentation: For lookup in Kjernejournal: Indicates timestamp from witch changes shall be returned

parameter.name: SamtykkeKjernejournal
parameter.documentation: Patient consent type for access to Medication data (HPAKUTT, HPMOTTATTSAMTYKKE, HPUNNTAK)

parameter.name: SamtykkeSperretLegemidler
parameter.documentation: Patient consent type for access to disclosed Medication data (HPAKUTT, HPMOTTATTSAMTYKKE)

parameter.name: SamtykkeLasteResepter
parameter.documentation: Patient consent type for access to LÅST RESEPT / locked prescriptions (HPAKUTT, HPMOTTATTSAMTYKKE)

parameter.name: IncludeOriginal
parameter.documentation: Flag for inclusion of (elements from) original e-resep messages

parameter.name: KJHentetTidspunkt
parameter.documentation: Time for result from KJ. Absensce shall be interpreted as no lookup performed

parameter.name: RFHentetTidspunkt
parameter.documentation: Time for result from RF. Absensce shall be interpreted as no lookup performed

parameter.name: RFM96Feilkode
parameter.documentation: Error response from RF on M9.6 lookup

parameter.name: RFM912Feilkode
parameter.documentation: Error response from RF on M9.12 lookup
